review_blob: Enjoyed it while in York, at the Golden Fleece. Excellent session beer, wish we had this in the USA!
Excellent ale, one of my favorites when in the UK. Wonderful hoppy finish and nice body.
One of the greatest ales there are. Its certainly one of my favorites if not #1. An excellent session beer when you can find it well kept.

The key to evaluating this ale is to have more than one. They usually taste better in the second  and third pints, which is unusual with so many other beers.

The only problem I found with it is it is often served TOO COLD, a problem common in the USA.
